Kar 13 ur so jo spreminjali v pošast
Heidi Klum blestela na zabavi v maskah. Navdih za letošnjo preobrazbo ji je dal mož.
05 Nov 2019, 16:44 by T. P.

Za grozljivo, futuristično masko Heidi in Toma tiči romantična zgodba.



instagramPrivlačni par se za en dan v letu poslovi od lepote. FOTO: instagram


Ko beseda nanese na noč čarovnic, nekdanja supermanekenka Heidi Klum vse druge pusti daleč za seboj. »Ko mi ljudje pomagajo, da zlezem iz kostuma, že razmišljam in premlevam, v kaj bi se našemila prihodnje leto,« pravi Heidi, za noč čarovnic vselej neprepoznavna, in gleda debelo leto vnaprej. V minulih letih se je tako prelevila že v volkodlaka iz glasbenega spota Michaela Jacksona, princeso Fiono iz Shreka, zapeljivo seks bombo Jessico Rabbit in samo sebe kot betežno starko. Z vsakokratnim kostumom, pri katerih nikoli ni ničesar prepustila naključju in je bila pozorna na vsako, še tako majhno podrobnost, je upravičila naziv kraljice noči čarovnic. Tudi letos, četudi ljudem na prvo žogo morda ni bilo jasno, kaj se skriva za njeno precej


Za grozljivo, futuristično masko Heidi in Toma tiči romantična zgodba.

odvratno podobo nezemljanke, ki pod roko drži okrvavljenega astronavta, v skafandru katerega je tičal njen mož Tom Kaulitz.Od običajno nadvse privlačnega para ni ostalo niti sledu. Heidi se je namreč spremenila v grozljivo in srh vzbujajočo nezemljanko, katere čreva molijo ven in se skoraj razlijejo po tleh, možganov pa ji ne ščitijo in skrivajo lobanja in lasje, temveč le prozorna čelada. Ob njej pa pretepen, s krvjo zamazan astronavt. A čeprav bi marsikdo v strahu in studu brž odvrnil pogled od njiju, sta vendar pripovedovala romantično zgodbo, navdih za katero sta našla v Tomovem glasbenem bendu Tokio Hotel, ki verjame v življenje onkraj našega planeta. »Jaz sem astronavt, ki v vesolju išče planet, na katerem bi lahko ljudje živeli, saj smo Zemljo uničili. Na tej svoji poti pa naletim na to bitje, ki me je očaralo. Odpeljal sem jo domov, na domači planet, tudi ker ima morda informacije, ki bi nam lahko koristile,« je pravljično ozadje njune futuristične maske razložil Tom.
Tudi letos se je na Heidijini zabavi trlo znanih imen, med njimi Mariah Carey, Jonathan Van Ness, Maluma, Lupita Nyong’o in Neil Patrick Harris.
Za Klumovo ni večjega praznika od noči čarovnic. To vsako leto potrdi z velikansko zabavo v maskah, na kateri se tare znanih in še bolj znanih, vsi v dodelanih kostumih. Ker je letos pripravila jubilejno 20. maškarado ob noči čarovnic, je želela to okroglo obletnico deliti z navadnimi smrtniki. »Pomislila sem, da bi bilo zabavno, če bi ljudje lahko opazovali mojo transformacijo.« Zaradi tega se je spretnim rokam maskerjev in umetnikov, ki so ji pomagali, da zleze v silikonski kostum, dolgih 13 ur prepuščala kar v izložbenem oknu trgovine, da so mimoidoči lahko opazovali, kako se je iz lepotice počasi spreminjala v pošast, ki bi lahko konkurirala Frankensteinu.

She was turned into a monster for 13 hours
Heidi Klum shone at the masked party. Her husband gave her inspiration for this year's makeover.

Behind the creepy, futuristic mask of Heidi and Tom lies a romantic story.



instagramAttractive couple get engaged in beauty for one day a year. PHOTO: instagram


As word spells on Halloween, former supermodel Heidi Klum leaves everyone else far behind. "When people help me get out of the costume, I'm already thinking and thinking about what to do next year," says Heidi, always unrecognizable for Halloween, and looking a fat year ahead. In recent years, she has become a wolf boy from Michael Jackson's music video, Princess Fiona from Shrek, Jessica Rabbit's seductive sex bomb, and herself as a pregnant woman. With every costume she never left to chance, and paid attention to every little detail, she justified the title of Queen of Halloween. Even this year, even though the people at the first ball might not have been clear what was hiding behind her pretty much


Behind the creepy, futuristic mask of Heidi and Tom lies a romantic story.

the hideous image of an alien holding a bleeding astronaut in her arm, in the space of which her husband, Tom Kaulitz, was banging. There was no trace of a normally attractive couple. Heidi has turned into a terrifying and heart-wrenching extraterrestrial whose intestines are begging out and almost spilling over the floor, her brain not protecting her and hiding her skull and hair, but only a transparent helmet. Beside her, a beat up, blood-smeared astronaut. Although many in fear and in the studio would have turned their eyes away from them, they still told a romantic story, the inspiration for which they found in Tom's music band Tokio Hotel, who believes in life beyond our planet. "I'm an astronaut looking for a planet in space for humans to live on since we destroyed the Earth. On this path, however, I come across this creature that fascinated me. I took her home, to her home planet, even because she may have information that might be of use to us, "Tom explained the fairy-tale background of their futuristic mask.
Also this year, Heidi's party has been trashed with famous names, including Mariah Carey, Jonathan Van Ness, Maluma, Lupita Nyong'o and Neil Patrick Harris.
There is no greater holiday for Klum than Halloween. This is confirmed every year by a giant mask party, at which tare famous and even better known, all in elaborate costumes. Having prepared the 20th Anniversary Halloween Masquerade this year, she wanted to share this round anniversary with ordinary mortals. "I thought it would be fun if people could observe my transformation." As a result, the skilful hands of masqueraders and artists who helped her slip into a silicone costume left her alone in the store window for 13 hours. passers-by could watch her slowly transform from a beauty into a monster that could compete with Frankenstein.
